overview: 07.07.07 is Nephew's fifth album, and their second live album. It was recorded from Roskilde Festival's Orange Stage on the night of Saturday, the festival's most important concert time. Extracts from the DVD were broadcast on DR2 on Tuesday 4 December. It is also the CD where the track Hospital feat. L.O.C. is located on the. The name comes from the date of their concert, namely 7 July 2007.
title: Nephew: 07.07.07
